column4: Hi guys. Can you tell me how to partion running system? I have one big partition /dev/sda(/) 140GigaB, udev(/dev), tmpfs(/run), none(/run/lock), none(/run/shm). Have 6 users with shell access and in future possibly apache, etc.
You cannot partition a running system, you have to do it offline.
just thought there may be a way to partition system for better security and speed - was guessing.
Partitioning has nothing to do with speed or security. :)
